scripts.build: node-utils-file-system-glob-delete "dist/**/*" && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node-utils-file-system-glob-rename .js .mjs "dist/esm/**/*" && node-utils-file-system-glob-copy dist/esm dist "**/*" && node-utils-file-system-glob-delete dist/esm && node-utils-file-system-glob-copy ./ dist package.json
